title: Russia steps up assaults as Ukraine appeals for more help - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. Russia steps up assaults as Ukraine appeals for more help  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. WATCH: View of Kyiv skyline as besieged Ukrainian capital faces fresh attacks  Washington Post
  3. March 15, 2022 Russia-Ukraine news  CNN
  4. Live updates: Russian fighting intensifies in Kyiv suburbs  Boston 25 News
  5. Ukraine-Russia war live updates: E.U. leaders visit Kyiv as Ukraine officials see room for compromise with Russia  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Russia escalated its bombardment of the Ukrainian capital and launched new assaults on the port city of Mariupol, making bloody advances on the ground as Ukraine’s president prepared Wednesday to make a direct appeal for more help in a rare speech by a foreign leader to the U.S.
